text: pasuva æyaṭa “mema māligāvaṭa ætuḷu vanu” yayi kiyanu læbuvāya. æya eya duṭu avasthāvēdī (polovehi patita kara tibū paḷin̆gū), jalaya yayi sitā æn̆duma (notemī siṭinu piṇisa) vaḷalūkaren (poḍiyak) osavā gattāya. (suleyimān “eya vatura nova) paḷin̆gū patita kara æti māligāvaki” yayi pævasuvēya. eyaṭa æya “magē deviyanē! niyata vaśayenma mā maṭama hāniyak kara ganimin siṭiyemi. lōkayanhi deviyan vana allāhṭa, suleyimān samaga mamat sampūrṇayenma avanata vannemi” yayi pævasuvāya
